mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, D.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE_BOARD_EVENT ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) D) B WHERE B.R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TABLE_BOARD_EVENT (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_ID, BOARD_DATE, FILE_NAME, EVT_START_DT, EVT_END_DT, BOARD_ZIPCODE, BOARD_ADDRESS, BOARD_ADDRESS_DETAIL, BOARD_ADDRESS_ETC, BOARD_PHONENUMBER, BOARD_CALLNUMBER) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ_EVENT.NEXTVAL, #{board_Title}, #{board_Content}, #{board_Id}, SYSDATE, #{file_name}, to_date(#{EVT_START_DT}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), to_date(#{EVT_END_DT}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{board_Zipcode}, #{board_Address}, #{board_Address_Detail}, #{board_Address_etc}, #{board_PhoneNumber}, #{board_CallNumber})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TABLE_BOARD_EVENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND BOARD_ADDRESS LIKE '#{col}'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '#{keyword}%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '#{keyword}%' OR BOARD_ADDRESS LIKE '#{keyword}%'
SELECT * FROM TABLE_REPLY_EVENT WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_Num} ORDER BY REPLY_NUM DESC
